root.description: web3.0 facebook is a stunt to create a social network like facebook which is uncensored and purely based on web3.0 where there is no any watcher over your assets, You have full authority over your assets . Build on top of Solana Chain with anchor framework Rust for the smartcontracts and Nextjs for front-end and Back-end. NOTE: everything is Stored on Solana Blockchain we are not using any relational databases coz it will break the rule of it is being said decenterlized.
root.name: web3.0_facebook
